paragraph.paragraph:
To save the project that is currently open, select Save from the File menu or click on
/images/eiffelbuild/icons/icon_save_color.png in the
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/10_general_interface_description/20_main_toolbars.xml main toolbar .
Alternatively, you may use the keyboard shortcut - Ctrl+S
paragraph.note: Note: If no changes have been made to the system, the save command will be disabled.
